Journey Through the Green Mountains

White River Junction, Vermont

Lake Tahoe is one of the most breathtaking attractions located in California. It's home to a number of ski eat, summer outdoor recreation, and tourist attractions. Snow and skiing are a significant part of the area's reputation.

Find out more

Check out all the events

As spawning season approaches, the fish acquire a humpback and protuberant jaw. After spawning, they die and their carcasses provide a feast for gatherings of mink, bears, and bald eagles.

See the events

Where to Eat

White River is full of wonderful places to eat. Here are our top recommendations:

  • Revolution

    Hip store selling vintage & consignment apparel, upcycled accessories, antique housewares & more.

  • Scavenger

    Handmade Jewelry

  • Post

    Stationary, gift wrap, art supplies and gifts.
